channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- Honor 5C, P9 Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- Honor 5C, P9 Lite

item.title: CVE-2017-8143|2024-09-17T03:17:53.947Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- honor%205c%2C%20p9%20lite
item.description: Wi-Fi driver of Honor 5C and P9 Lite Huawei smart phones with software versions earlier than NEM-L21C432B351 and versions earlier than VNS-L21C10B381 has a DoS vulnerability. An attacker may trick a user into installing a malicious application and the application can access invalid address of driver to crash the system.
